## Loading R packages


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
pacman::p_load(tidyverse, ggdist, ggridges, colorspace, ggthemes)
```
:::


## Reading data


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
exam_data <- read_csv("data/Exam_data.csv")
```
:::


## Visualizing Distribution


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
ggplot(exam_data,
       aes(x = ENGLISH)) +
  geom_density(
    color = "#1696d2",
    adjust = 0.65,
    alpha = 0.6
  )
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](In-class_Ex02_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-3-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::
